name: Open Source HardWare Library - SELECTION
tagline: OSHW documents for everyone to enjoy
body:
**no content yet, check out [OSHWL *candidates*](http://oshwl.github.io/candidates/)**

#OSHWL *SELECTION*

OSHW documents, compliant with the following:

1. possible **formats**:
  - if not exceeding 50 lines: Markdown
  - PDF and EPUB files (LaTeX-generated, unique class to be determined)
2. english **language**
3. structurally **complete** (subjective)

the aim here is to cultivate completeness, readability and uniformity among others.

candidate documents for OSHW *SELECTION* can be found in [OSHWL *candidates*](http://oshwl.github.io/candidates/). everyone is welcome to meddle with them or add new ones!

all those documents' source files are in [*SOURCE*](https://github.com/OSHWL/SELECTION/tree/master/SOURCE), for anyone to meddle with (even while they're posted here!)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
